website_summaries.verdict: The best pick if you’re looking for an inexpensive yet solid and attractive flask.
pros: High quality at a low price
Sturdy stainless steel, but still lightweight
Has a large cap so you can easily open it with gloves
Comes in both 5- and 8-ounce sizes, as well as green or navy finish
cons: This option does not come with a funnel
The plastic cap can strip, which can lead to leaking

customer_reviews.title: I put some whiskey in it, poured it out ...
customer_reviews.text: I put some whiskey in it, poured it out after a few days, liquid was BLACK. I don't drink from it anymore because it's obviously not real stainless steel inside
customer_reviews.author: Marc J

customer_reviews.title: It is not properly air tight.
customer_reviews.text: It is not properly air tight. If you do not keep it upright, do not expect the liquor to stay inside. A factor may be that I like to add cold liquor, which would increase air pressure as it warms, but this is a small container. Even a plastic bottle can manage a seal.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great flask at a great price

customer_reviews.title: I filled it with whisky let it sit a couple weeks in a cool dark basement
customer_reviews.text: Ok 3 weeks is as long as i can stand it. I filled it with whisky let it sit a couple weeks in a cool dark basement, then it traveled with me in my backpack for a week as i proceeded to empty it. No change in taste or colour. Being metal toss it in a creek or cooler to take the heat right out if left in the sun for too long of a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for giving or receiving.  It's Stanley after all!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these flasks as Christmas gifts and they were well received. All 3 said they liked the size as fits in pocket or backpack easily. product_meta.title: Stanley Adventure Stainless Steel Flask
product_meta.description: Since William Stanley invented the all-steel vacuum bottle in 1913, the Stanley brand has been a part of countless adventures and even more shared memories. From camping trips with dad to adventures with friends, our products are prized possessions passed down from generation to generation. All Stanley Vacuum bottles are built with rustproof and naturally BPA-free 18/8 grade stainless steel that takes a beating, a durable hammertone powder coat, a wide mouth for easy cleaning and ice compatibility, as well as our Built for Life lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: 18/8 stainless steel won't rust; naturally BPA-free
